Package com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.mappers

Data mappers for transforming between UI form data and domain models.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OdpMapper
    Mapper class for converting between presentation layer form data and domain model.
    OdpSearchCriteriaMapper
    Mapper class for converting between presentation layer form data and service layer search criteria.

Package com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.mappers Description

Data mappers for transforming between UI form data and domain models.

Overview

This package contains mapper classes that handle bidirectional data transformation between the presentation layer (form EntitiesData with ERParams) and the domain model (POJOs like Odp, OdpSearchCriteria, etc.). Mappers keep the layers decoupled and manage data format conversions.

Mappers

OdpMapper

OdpMapper handles ODP entity mapping:

  • toFormData(Odp, EntitiesData) - Loads ODP data into form fields
  • fromFormData(EntitiesData, Odp) - Extracts form data into ODP object
  • Maps all ODP properties (header, beneficiary, amounts, dates, etc.)
  • Handles nested objects (company, currency, supplier, users, etc.)

OdpSearchCriteriaMapper

OdpSearchCriteriaMapper handles search filter mapping:

  • fromFormData(EntitiesData) - Creates search criteria from filter form
  • Maps company, states, date ranges, owner, assignee filters
  • Handles optional/nullable search parameters

Mapper Responsibilities

Data Transformation

Convert between different data representations:

  • ERParam values <-> Domain object properties
  • String codes <-> Entity objects
  • Display strings <-> Enum values
  • Date formats <-> Date objects

Null Handling

Safely handle null and empty values:

  • Check for null before accessing nested properties
  • Set null in domain when form field is empty
  • Leave form fields empty when domain property is null

Type Conversion

Convert between UI and domain types:

  • String -> Number, Date, Boolean
  • Code String -> Entity object
  • Enum -> String representation

Design Patterns

Bidirectional Mapping

Each mapper provides two-way transformation: 


 public class OdpMapper {
     // Domain -> Form
     public static void toFormData(Odp odp, OdpDetailFormEntitiesData data) {
         data.getAzienda().setValue(odp.getAzienda());
         data.getValuta().setValue(odp.getValuta());
         // ... map all fields
     }

     // Form -> Domain
     public static void fromFormData(OdpDetailFormEntitiesData data, Odp odp) {
         odp.setAzienda(data.getAzienda().getValue());
         odp.setValuta(data.getValuta().getValue());
         // ... map all fields
     }
 }

Immutable Source

toFormData doesn't modify the source domain object:

  • Read from domain object
  • Write to form EntitiesData
  • Domain object remains unchanged

Mutable Target

fromFormData modifies the target domain object:

  • Read from form EntitiesData
  • Write to domain object (via setters)
  • Caller provides the target instance

Usage Examples

Loading Form from ODP


 // In form's data loading method
 public void loadOdp(String odpId) throws Exception {
     // Retrieve domain object
     IOdpService service = getSimpleApplication().getIOdpService();
     Odp odp = service.findOdpById(odpId);

     // Map to form
     OdpDetailFormEntitiesData data = getSimpleEntitiesData();
     OdpMapper.toFormData(odp, data);

     // Form fields now populated
 }

Saving Form to ODP


 // In action's execute method
 public String getNextStateID(boolean validated) throws Exception {
     if (validated) {
         // Get form data
         OdpDetailFormEntitiesData data = form.getSimpleEntitiesData();

         // Create domain object
         Odp odp = new Odp();

         // Map from form
         OdpMapper.fromFormData(data, odp);

         // Save via service
         IOdpService service = form.getSimpleApplication().getIOdpService();
         String odpId = service.createOdp(odp, userId);

         return "TASKS";
     }
     return null;
 }

Building Search Criteria


 // In search form
 public List<Odp> performSearch() throws Exception {
     // Get filter form data
     OdpSearchFormEntitiesData data = getSimpleEntitiesData();

     // Map to search criteria
     OdpSearchCriteria criteria = OdpSearchCriteriaMapper.fromFormData(data);

     // Execute search
     IOdpService service = getSimpleApplication().getIOdpService();
     return service.searchOdps(criteria, sortCriteria, from, rows);
 }

Mapping Strategies

Simple Properties


 // Direct mapping
 data.getNumeroProtocollo().setValue(odp.getNumeroProtocollo());
 odp.setNumeroProtocollo(data.getNumeroProtocollo().getValue());

Entity Properties


 // Entity object mapping
 data.getAzienda().setValue(odp.getAzienda());
 odp.setAzienda(data.getAzienda().getValue());

Date Properties


 // Date mapping
 data.getDataCompilazione().setValue(odp.getDataCompilazione());
 odp.setDataCompilazione(data.getDataCompilazione().getValue());

Numeric Properties


 // Number mapping
 data.getImporto().setValue(odp.getImporto());
 odp.setImporto(data.getImporto().getValue());

Enum Properties


 // Enum mapping
 data.getStato().setValue(odp.getStato());
 odp.setStato(data.getStato().getValue());

Null-Safe Mapping


 // Handle potential nulls
 OdpCurrency valuta = odp.getValuta();
 if (valuta != null) {
     data.getValuta().setValue(valuta);
 } else {
     data.getValuta().setValue(null);
 }

Validation Integration

Mappers work with the validation system:

  1. User submits form
  2. Framework validates ERParams
  3. If validation passes, action uses mapper
  4. Mapper extracts validated data to domain object
  5. Service layer performs additional business validation

Best Practices

Keep Mappers Simple

  • Pure data transformation, no business logic
  • No service calls or database access
  • No validation (handled by ERParams and service layer)

Handle All Fields

  • Map every form field to domain property
  • Map every domain property to form field
  • Document any intentionally skipped fields

Null Safety

  • Check for null before accessing nested properties
  • Use defensive coding for optional fields
  • Don't assume ERParam values are non-null

Static Methods

  • Mappers are stateless utility classes
  • Use static methods for mapping operations
  • No instance state required
